summary: last week demelza poldark was barely showing – but she is now the proud mother to the show’s latest addition . within ten minutes of tomorrow night’s episode, fans will see aidan turner’s dashing ross poldark gaze lovingly at his new baby daughter . what is rather less convincing, however, is the timeline of the pregnancy .
